pl.core

Class KB

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.core.KB
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModusPonensKB, WumpusWorldKB

    public class KB
extends java.lang.Object
    A KB is a set (actually a List) of Sentences and a SymbolTable holding the PropositionalSymbols used in those sentences.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<Sentence> sentences 
      protected SymbolTable symtab

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Sentence s)
      Add the given Sentence to this KB.
      void dump()
      Print the contents of this KB to System.out.
      Symbol intern(java.lang.String name)
      Intern the given name in this KB's SymbolTable and return the corresponding Symbol.
      java.util.Collection<Sentence> sentences()
      Return this KB's Sentences as a Collection.
      java.util.Collection<Symbol> symbols()
      Return the Symbols interned in this KB's SymbolTable as a Collection.
